name: PFIZER INC., et al., petitioners, v. RITE AID CORPORATION, et al.
name_abbreviation: Pfizer Inc. v. Rite Aid Corp.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
PFIZER INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
RITE AID CORPORATION, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
PFIZER INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
RITE AID CORPORATION, et al.
No. 17-752.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 20, 2018.
Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
